creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: farming scenes: at R, man stands near the center of a small field with a seed bag strapped around shoulder, spreading seeds; another man at LRC chops at one of the many trees along R edge; at L, a man plows a field with three horses, while a figure with a whip sits on the rear horse; a ram surrounded by clouds at center separates the two scenes
marks: Signature monogram in plate at top right: [FB]
title: Month of March with Aries
